name: Toddler Simulator
description: Enter the world of toddlers, where anything not bolted down is ready to be destroyed.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista Processor: Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or equivalent; DirectX 11 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
